name: INPayBillIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for paying a bill using money from the userâ€™s account.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveBillPayee(for: INPayBillIntent, with: (INBillPayeeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the entity that originated the bill.

items.name: func resolveBillType(for: INPayBillIntent, with: (INBillTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the type of the bill.

items.name: func resolveFromAccount(for: INPayBillIntent, with: (INPaymentAccountResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the user account that provides the funds for paying the bill.

items.name: func resolveTransactionAmount(for: INPayBillIntent, with: (INPaymentAmountResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the amount to pay toward the bill.

items.name: func resolveDueDate(for: INPayBillIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the due date of the bill.

items.name: func resolveTransactionScheduledDate(for: INPayBillIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the date for the payment to occur.

items.name: func resolveTransactionNote(for: INPayBillIntent, with: (INStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves any custom notes associated with the transaction.

items.name: func handle(intent: INPayBillIntent, completion: (INPayBillIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles scheduling payment of the bill.
